## Dataframes for nestlings and climate metrics

```{r df}
nestlings <- read.csv("CrowNestlingClimate_AllNestlingsCleaned.csv", h=TRUE)
climate <- read.csv("ClimateMetrics_ForJoining.csv", h=TRUE)
```

df <- left_join(nestlings,climate, by = "HatchDateJulYear")
